produce.name: Leek
produce.description: Plauging houses built in the early 2000's, leeks have given many families nights filled with sleepless worries.

produce.name: Prickly Pear
produce.description: Also known as the Barbary fig this particular fruit should be eaten in a single gulp, spines and all.

produce.name: Cherimoya
produce.description: Honestly Dave, our stockist, bought them as a joke. No one know what these are.

produce.name: Permissons
produce.description: These are no different from tomatos. Treat as a 1-to-1 replacement in recipes.

produce.name: Kale
produce.description: Kale rhyming with fail is no accident. This digusting plant has forced its way into the mainstream through aggressive lobbying and dirty deals which are tantamount to treason.

produce.name: Pear
produce.description: Understated and humble, this delight wows audiences worldwide and should definatley be bought instead of disgusting kale.

produce.name: Pumello
produce.description: Looks a bit like a lime so must taste a bit like a lime.

produce.name: Turnip
produce.description: Turnips are the workhorse of the tubular root family bringing nutrition to millions of the starving masses during the cold winter months.
